entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
